title: Jan. 6 Panel Is Likely to Seek Interview With Ginni Thomas - The New York Times
content:
1. Jan. 6 Panel Is Likely to Seek Interview With Ginni Thomas  The New York Times
  2. January 6 committee conisders action on Ginni Thomas texts  CNN
  3. Ginni Thomas texts spark calls for Clarence Thomas to recuse himself from election cases  Yahoo News
  4. Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas' wife, Ginni, is Hillary Clinton on steroids  The Arizona Republic
  5. Clarence Thomas’s reaction to his wife Ginni’s text messages says it all. This is what we can do  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The House committee is reaching out to the wife of Justice Clarence Thomas after public disclosure of text messages documenting her support for President Donald J. Trump’s efforts to overturn the election.
